meanings.definition: A group of women associated with one man.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the king had a harem of beautiful women.
meanings.sent2: The sultan's harem lived in a luxurious part of the palace.
meanings.sent3: The harem of ladies followed the prince everywhere, causing much gossip.
meanings.sent4: Her group of friends could be seen as a harem, always together.
meanings.sent5: The harem of dancers moved gracefully in unison.

meanings.definition: The living quarters reserved for wives and concubines in a Muslim household.
meanings.sent1: The harem in the palace was beautifully decorated.
meanings.sent2: Only the sultan was allowed to enter the harem.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat sneaked into the harem and caused chaos.
meanings.sent4: The harem glowed in the evening light, a hidden paradise.
meanings.sent5: She imagined the harem as a secret garden, full of mysteries.

meanings.definition: A group of female animals sharing a single male for breeding purposes.
meanings.sent1: The farmer kept a harem of cows for breeding.
meanings.sent2: The lion's harem protected the cubs from danger.
meanings.sent3: The harem of hens followed the rooster around the farm.
meanings.sent4: The harem of elephants marched together in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The harem of birds chirped happily in the trees.
